channel.title: Another first elevator bug.
channel.description:
When entering the very first elevator in Unforseen Consequences, I wasn't all the way in the elevator, apparently, when I hit the button. The elevator started, but then I received damage, presumably from getting smashed. I didn't die, though. But, the elevator stopped and then wouldn't move again.
I had to load the autosave right after the resonance cascade.

item.title: Another first elevator bug.
item.dc:creator: Skoffer
item.description:
When entering the very first elevator in Unforseen Consequences, I wasn’t all the way in the elevator, apparently, when I hit the button. The elevator started, but then I received damage, presumably from getting smashed. I didn’t die, though. But, the elevator stopped and then wouldn’t move again.

I had to load the autosave right after the resonance cascade.
